Key Match Events: LeBron James scored 30 points and had 8 assists
Austin Reaves had 20 points and 7 assists
Jalen Johnson scored 19 points on 8-13 shooting
Post-Match Reflections: The Hawks' defense was especially poor in the 2nd quarter
The real story of Atlanta's deficit was from their three-point shooting and losing the FT battle
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Hawks played three quarters of reasonably solid basketball and outplayed the Lakers in the turnover battle
Others: The Hawks lost despite getting both Bogdan Bogdanovic and Jalen Johnson back
Anthony Davis made his return to the lineup after not playing against Portland the previous night
